script:
;;-----------------------------------------
;;7月覚醒マイペ
# script "lisp"
# background "aerial_shoot"
# bgm "bgm036" 0
;;-----------------------------------------
;;芭蕉扇
# body 500811
# pos 500811 3
# scale 500811 0.8 0
# layer 500811 3
# mask 500811 off
# alpha 500811 0 0
# body 500814
# pos 500814 3
# scale 500814 0.8 0
# layer 500814 3
# mask 500814 off
# alpha 500814 0 0
;;アスクレピオス
# body 600151
# pos 600151 3
# scale 600151 0.8 0
# layer 600151 3
# mask 600151 off
# alpha 600151 0 0
# body 600154
# pos 600154 3
# scale 600154 0.8 0
# layer 600154 3
# mask 600154 off
# alpha 600154 0 0
;;-----------------------------------------
# imageset 0 "black"
# imagealpha 0 0 0
# imagepos 0 0 0
# imagelayer 0 1
# imageset 1 "bg_white_circle"
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagepos 1 0 0
# imagelayer 1 4
# imagescale 1 1.4 0
# imageset 2 "bg_white_circle"
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# imagepos 2 0 0
# imagelayer 2 5
# imagescale 2 1.5 0
;;-----------------------------------------
# envbody 11111 8 0
# effectpattern 11111 1 0
;;-----------------------------------------
# fadein "black" 2
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 2

# textwindow "nomal"
# textflame 0 0
# textalign "center"
# textsize 38
@
[FF0000]覚醒ユニット[-]
2体登場！

# imagealpha 1 1 0.5
# imagepos 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 1 0.5
# imagepos 2 0 0
# se "SE_2520"
# alpha 500811 1 0.5
# textflame 0 0
# textalign "center"
# textsize 36
@
芭蕉扇
[FF0000]覚醒！[-]

# se "SE_9182"
# fadein "white" 0.7
# alpha 500811 0 0
# alpha 500814 1 0
# envbody 1002 11 0
# effectpattern 1002 2 0
# effectstart 1002
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# textalign "center"
# textsize 36
@
芭蕉扇
[FF0000]覚醒！[-]

# imageset 0 "black"
# imagealpha 0 0 0
# imagelayer 0 1
# voice 5008 "bashosen_kyara_0020"
# textflame 1 1
# textsize 24
# textboxarrow 0 2
@芭蕉扇
あらあら
これ以上高貴になったら
どうしましょう♪

;;暗転挟む
# imagealpha 0 1 0
# imagepos 0 0 30
# imageleftin 0 0.3
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.3

# effectskip 1002
# alpha 500814 0 0
# waitandnext 0.2

# imagealpha 0 0 0.3
# imagerightout 0 0.3
# waitandnext 0.3

# imagealpha 1 1 0.5
# imagepos 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 1 0.5
# imagepos 2 0 0
# se "SE_2520"
# alpha 600151 1 0.5
# textwindow "nomal"
# textflame 0 0
# textalign "center"
# textsize 36
@
アスクレピオス
[FF0000]覚醒！[-]

# se "SE_9182"
# fadein "white" 0.7
# alpha 600151 0 0
# alpha 600154 1 0
# envbody 1002 11 0
# effectpattern 1002 2 0
# effectstart 1002
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# textalign "center"
# textsize 36
@
アスクレピオス
[FF0000]覚醒！[-]

# voice 6001 "asukurepiosu_kyara_0014"
# textflame 1 1
# textsize 24
# textboxarrow 0 2
@アスクレピオス
努力が実を結ぶ
当たり前すぎる結果よね

;;暗転挟む
# imagealpha 0 1 0
# imagepos 0 0 30
# imageleftin 0 0.3
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.3

# effectskip 1002
# alpha 600154 0 0
# waitandnext 0.2

# imagealpha 0 0 0.3
# imagerightout 0 0.3
# waitandnext 0.3

# textwindow "nomal"
# textflame 0 0
# textalign "center"
# textsize 32
@
イベントクエスト
「淘汰の彼方に」開催！

# fadein "white" 0.5
# textflame 0 0
# textalign "center"
# textsize 32
@
詳しくは
お知らせを要チェック！

;;暗転(大)
# bgm "stop"
# fadeout "black" 2
# se "SE_0050"
# textwindow "nomal"
# textalign "center"
# textsize 32
# waitandnext 2
@
詳しくは
お知らせを要チェック！
